articles.title: Now you can turn a photo into an AI video with this Google tool - The Washington Post
articles.description: Google’s Gemini AI app now lets users create short videos from still images using its Veo 3 video generator.

articles.title: Double Your Printing Fun With Dual-Light 3D Printing - Hackaday
articles.description: Using light to 3D print liquid resins is hardly a new idea. But researchers at the University of Texas at Austin want to double down on the idea. Specifically, they use a resin with different physi…
